about.name: Roy Chen
about.education: Asia Eastern University of Science and Technology

introduction.section1: I love learning practical programs to help me organize information by better efficient way. Usually, I will pay attention to the trends of technology, finance and art, which can constantly increase my knowledge, and can also learn a different ways of thinking and solutions. If I encounter a problem while developing, I can often find many resources on the web to help me solve it.
introduction.section2: So, I am grateful for live in this generation.

bibian.instruction: Develop official website; develop official website content management system; develop similar "World Shopping" services.

bankpro.instruction: Develop "Enterprise Internet Banking" project. Mainly responsible for the transaction functions of Taiwan currency and foreign currencies; some query and management settings; give technical suggestions and feedback for UI/UX.

arcoa.instruction:
Develop & Maintain two "WMS warehouse management systems".
Optimize user requirement.
Fetch customer API.
Develop task scheduler to get data from database, and send mail to customer or user.
